Located in Storrs-Mansfield, CT, TOAST, Four Corners is "your cornerstone to great food!" Our breads and muffins are fresh baked on site. Oh, and by the way - did we mention that we offer a full line of Gluten free alternatives?!

Stop by and join us for a fresh brewed cup of coffee from our local coffee roaster and a meal that will have you coming back for more! We'll see you soon.
